path /v3/offchain/xrp/transfer
opid xrptransfer
params None
sum send xrp from a virtual account to the blockchain
reqBody
oneof
type object
props
senderaccountid
maxlength 24
minlength 24
desc sender account id
type string
account
maxlength 100
minlength 1
desc xrp account address must be the one used for generating deposit tags
type string
address
desc blockchain address to send assets
maxlength 100
minlength 1
type string
amount
desc amount to be sent in xrp
maxlength 38
pattern ddd
type string
compliant
desc compliance check if withdrawal is not compliant it will not be processed
type boolean
attr
desc destination tag of the recipient account if any must be stringified uint32
type string
sourcetag
desc source tag of sender account if any
type integer
paymentid
desc identifier of the payment shown for created transaction within tatum sender account
maxlength 100
minlength 1
type string
secret
maxlength 29
minlength 29
desc secret for account secret or signature id must be present
type string
sendernote
maxlength 500
minlength 1
desc note visible to owner of withdrawing account
type string

account
senderaccountid
address
amount
secret
